title: Flora/Camille/Irelia
body:
Hey,

So I wanted to ask u who should I main Top Flora, Camille or Irelia? I played main mid but idk, its not so fun anymore and I really like the top champs I mentioned and imo every of the three is fun to play. So that's why I wanted to ask who is overall better?

replies.body: I would also recommend Fiora or Irelia

Fiora or Irelia, depending what you enjoy more.
Fiora full build is a pain in the ass. Imo more than Irelia. But Irelia is good in big tf's.
Just try out both tbh.

It depends on how much you want to interact with your team I guess. 
Irelia is the best teamfighter off of these champs in my opinion while fiora is the worst.
I say Camille is best at split pushing, while fiora is best at 1 vs 1. 
Why not play all 3? Maybe even add Jax?
If you are new to top lane I say play Camille, because she is probably the easiest to play and the hardest to punish. As long as you don't go aggressive yourself, you'll be pretty much unkillable.
